entry.title: Burton upon Trent war memorial (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Burton upon Trent war memorial (pictured) in England includes a depiction of Saint George standing atop the vanquished dragon?

entry.title: William D. Dunham (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that William D. Dunham threw a lifejacket to the Japanese pilot he shot down in aerial combat, after the pilot parachuted into the water?

entry.title: G-class trams, (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Victoria State Government has ordered 100 G-class trams, which is the largest domestic order in Australian history?

entry.title: Venla Luukkonen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Venla Luukkonen is the first Finnish person to win the World IBJJF Jiu-Jitsu Championship at black belt level?

entry.title: Citizens for Sanity (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Citizens for Sanity political action committee, opposing "woke insanity", ran ads saying "vote progressive this November"?

entry.title: Kenneth Lo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kenneth Lo was called "the foremost expert in Britain on Chinese food"?

entry.title: a California TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that an attempt by six employees of a California TV station to remain on the air by working unpaid lasted just three days?

entry.title: life of Buddha in art (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Japanese parodies of scenes from the life of Buddha in art include arrangements of vegetables?
